title: Velo Team’s Tour de France Podium Picks: Who Can Rip Up the Big 4 Script?
content:
Velo's editorial crew debate their hot takes and wild guesses at the Tour's top-3 - and no, it's not all about Pogačar, Vingegaard, Roglič, Evenepoel.

Read the full article at Velo Team’s Tour de France Podium Picks: Who Can Rip Up the Big 4 Script? on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
